ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( Start_Date__c <> End_Date__c, Deduction_Value__c <> 1, Deduction_Value__c <> 0 ), AND( Start_Date__c = End_Date__c, Deduction_Value__c <> 0, Deduction_Value__c <> 0.5, Deduction_Value__c <> 1 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For a single-day holiday, the Deduction Value must be 0, 0.5, or 1. For a multi-day holiday, it must be 0 or 1.
